Description:
Update:
Rehearsal will be on Friday, then we will meet up at 11:15am behind dwinelle where a van will come and pick us up to take us to foothill assembly to perform at 12pm.
-----------------------------------------------------
Hey Theatre Rice!

This is O'Dao Lovanh. I am an intern for R.E.A.C.H !, an Asian/ Pacific Islander Recruitment and Recruitment program at UC Berkeley. I am requesting to book Theatre to perform for us on March 11th between 12pm and 2pm.
During this weekend, we will be hosting 55-60 high school students from Oakland, Richmond, Sacramento, and Stockton for our bianual Shadow Night. They will arrive on campus March 9th and will be leaving March 11th. We want them to leave with a good impression of U.C Berkeley, a smile on their face, and laughter in their soul, so we are hoping Theatre Rice will help us make that possible. We will be providing the sound equipment and try to provide anything else that you guys may need. I hope you guys are intersted, thanks.

Ricers Signed Up:
